price: (192) And if they cease, then indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
